Status Definitions: No issues to move to next phase.
Schedule, Tech, or Resource, Priority risks the ability to complete the current phase.
Need Leadership Help (Time, Resources, Money, Priority) to move to next phase.
No updates provided by the Primary Point of Contact or stakeholders of the use case
Tried the idea but not moving to next phase due to strategic decision or de-prioritization or tech limitation.
The idea is not valid or a duplicate or not fit for an AI tool or solution.
